text: Sam Viviano (born March 13, 1953) is an American caricature artist and art director. He has been a lead artist for MAD Magazine since 1980. Viviano was born in Detroit, Michigan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sam Viviano at Summit Leadership Academy High Desert Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Detroit Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists
title: Sam Viviano
